item.title: 【Albums (lossless)】PACK - Celine Dion - The Colour Of My Love (30th Anniversary Fan Collection)
item.description:
The huge collection of "The Colour Of My Love" Era 1993-1995 from my collection for you.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
includes:

The Colour Of My Love (FLAC 16/44) /full album/
The Colour Of My Love (360 RA) /full album/
The Colour Of My Love Concert DVD5
The Colour Of My Love Concert (FLAC 16/44) /official bonus disc/
Misled (19 official remixes, ripped from original CDs and LPs)
Music Videos & Live (Various videos of Era)
TV Shows & Specials (9 full shows of Era)
Others Songs of Era (15 additional songs of Era in FLAC and lossy)
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
May peace, kindness, love and good music be with us in the new year ❤
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
